turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to understand a charge on my recent bill. It says $45 for 'Premium Support,' but I never signed up for that!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you with that. Could you please provide your account number or the email address associated with your account so I can look into this for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's account number 123456789. This is so frustrating! I've been a customer for years and this is the first time I've had an issue like this. Can you tell me when this so-called 'Premium Support' was added to my account?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I've checked your account. According to our records, the Premium Support was added on the 15th of last month. It seems the subscription was initiated through our website during a special promotion. I see a note that you may have accidentally clicked it while browsing. I've removed the charge and issued a credit to your account. This will be reflected in your next bill.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Wow, that's a relief! Okay, great, thank you so much for fixing this. I appreciate the quick resolution. Just out of curiosity, what exactly does 'Premium Support' include? And also, I'm worried about that happening again. Is there a way to prevent these accidental sign-ups in the future?
